section.class: content-container news1-container news_container content-size-small orientation-vertical thumbnail-orientation-horizontal

div.div: Welcome back to the last trimester of the school year! I hope you had a nice Spring Break. On Tuesday, April 21st, remote learning for all students will begin again. As we continue to live through these unprecedented times, COVID-19 has impacted numerous aspects of our daily lives from education to employment to social relationships.

SCHOOL CLOSURE EXTENDED TO JUNE 16TH. FOOD SERVICES for STUDENTS: Please note that meal services will continue Monday-Friday from 11-12:30 at the following locations: Anderson, DeMille, Hayden, Johnson, Stacey/Clegg, Warner, and Willmore.

SCHOOL CLOSURE EXTENDED TO APRIL 30th. FOOD SERVICES for STUDENTS: Please note that meal services will continue Monday-Friday from 11-12:30 at the following locations: Anderson, DeMille, Hayden, Johnson, Stacey/Clegg, Warner, and Willmore.

SCHOOL CLOSURE EXTENDED TO APRIL 17TH.
FOOD SERVICES for STUDENTS: Please note that meal services will continue Monday-Friday from 11-12:30 at the following locations: Anderson, DeMille, Hayden, Johnson, Stacey/Clegg, Warner, and Willmore.
